 the language you have selected. * Anytime you can change the language on Settings Recent Downloaded Unlocked Series Updated Updates When your bookmarked series are updated with new episodes, they will show up here. more My profile Sign up or Log in Promotion Code Gift Shop History Help Buy Coins Coins Transactions Information Please read before purchasing:
* Coins give you access to premium episodes.
* You can buy one episode for 2 coins.
* You can buy one episode for 2 coins.
* You can rent one episode for 1 coin.
 The rent is valid for 7 days.
* Coins and unlocked episodes are linked to your account.
* To know more about coins, check Coins Transactions. For more assistance, reach out to us at * Everyone who has a KrossKomics account also has a unique Invite link.
* You can invite up to 20 friends in total.
* You will receive bonus coins immediately when someone new signs up through your invite link.
* You will both receive extra 3 bonus coins when one of your friends purchases coins for the first time. * Features and available series may differ for the language you have selected.
* You can change the language by going on My Profile.
* You can change the language even offline to read the downloaded series.
* New languages will be updated soon. help@krosskomics.com Confirm My Gift Change email address Notification
